mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.template_id, t1.datasource_id, t1.rule_name, t1.schema_name, t1.table_unique, t1.table_name, CONCAT(IFNULL(t1.schema_name,''),'.',t1.table_name) AS tableAlias, t1.table_type AS tableType, t1.table_business_type AS tableBusinessType, t1.rule_check_type AS ruleCheckType, t1.rule_execute_node AS ruleExecuteNode, t1.rule_execute_sort, t1.rule_state AS ruleState, t1.rule_weight, t1.rule_describe, t1.create_time, t1.create_user, t2.template_type AS templateType, t2.template_name, t3.datasource_id AS fiDataSourceId, t3.datasource_type AS sourceType FROM tb_datacheck_rule t1 LEFT JOIN tb_template_config t2 ON t1.template_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN tb_datasource_config t3 ON t1.datasource_id = t3.id WHERE t1.del_flag = 1 AND t2.del_flag = 1 AND t3.del_flag = 1
